title: Are Asian American college applicants at a disadvantage? Supreme Court debate stirs fear
dc:creator: Teresa Watanabe, Anh Do, Jeong Park
description: The U.S. Supreme Court hearings on affirmative action this week highlighted widespread fears among Asian Americans that they face bias in selective college admissions.
content:encoded: The U.S. Supreme Court hearings on affirmative action this week highlighted widespread fears among Asian Americans that they face bias in selective college admissions.
